title: We're not remodeled! We're brand NEW! Check us out!
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Apex at 290!', 'Located at:', '290 E Main St', 'Elmsford, NY 10523', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: 2', '# of Bathrooms:  2', 'Square Footage: 1237 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $3814 - $4187/month', 'Contact our leasing office at (914) 595-2526', 'The APEX at 290 offers the very best of apartment living, with unsurpassed community amenities and unexpected luxury features.', 'You can relax on our rooftop deck and enjoy panoramic views, breathtaking sunsets, and everything you need for outdoor dining.', 'Exercise on your own schedule at our 24-hour, fully equipped fitness center.', "Spend time with family and friends in our expansive community room, with multiple lounge and gaming areas, a gas fireplace, and a wet bar/kitchenette with bistro seating that's perfect for group entertaining.", 'Socialize with your pets and neighbors at our landscaped pet park -- or just watch the action from our adjoining community park, with its beautiful shade trees and multiple seating areas.', 'And when the fun is done, return to your luxury apartment that feels more like a home, with its spacious, open-concept design and condo-inspired amenities.', 'Community Features:', '♥ Controlled Access', '♥ Furnished Units Available', '♥ Nearby Municipal Bus Stop', '♥ Package Concierge', '♥ Pet Washing Station', '♥ Picnic Area', '♥ Roof Terrace', '♥ Smoke-Free', '♥ TV Lounge', '♥ Video Patrol', '♥ 2,000 sq.', 'ft. Landscaped Outdoor Pet Park and Pet Grooming Station', '♥ 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '♥ Community Park- Elevated Views', '♥ Conveniently Located Near 287 and the Saw Mill River Parkway', '♥ Elevator Access to All Floors', '♥ Nearby Starbucks Just Steps Away', '♥ Option Between Uncovered Parking and Covered Parking with Elevator Access', '♥ Personal, Oversized Storage Rooms Available', '♥ Planned Social Activities', '♥ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', 'Unit Features:', '♥ Artfully Designed Bathrooms with Double Vanity Sinks and Custom Finishes', '♥ Eat-in Kitchen', '♥ Framed Mirrors', '♥ Full-Size Walk-in Closets', '♥ Ice Maker', '♥ Microwave', '♥ Patio', '♥ Refrigerator', '♥ Storage Units', '♥ Window Coverings', '♥ A Breakfast Bar, and Quartz Countertops', '♥ Artfully Designed Bathrooms with Double Vanity Sinks and Custom Finishes', '♥ Central Heating and Cooling', '♥ Full-Size Walk-in Closets', '♥ Full-size, Side-by-Side Washer & Dryer', '♥ Furnished Apartment Available*', '♥ Gourmet Kitchen with State-of-the-Art Appliances', '♥ SOUTH FACING', '♥ Spacious Light-Filled Layouts with High Ceilings and Expansive Windows', 'Office Hours:', 'Tue - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', '(914) 595-2526', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats and Dogs Allowed: We have a $500 pet fee per pet and $65 rent per pet each month.', 'Leasing Options:', '3-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management:', 'JRK Property Holdings', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '2FA7DF18B2D8463D']
